content:
<rule id="javaee-technology-usage-00011" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <xmlfile in="{*}.xml" matches="//*[local-name() = 'job']">
                    <namespace uri="http://xmlns.jcp.org/xml/ns/javaee"/>
                </xmlfile>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <technology-tag level="INFORMATIONAL">Java EE Batch</technology-tag>
            </perform>
        </rule>
